title: Is the ACC the best Quarterback league in the country?
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, and Joey Galloway discuss the extensive list of notable ACC quarterbacks this season and which teams from the conference could surprise everyone. Plus, the crew picks whether some ACC teams will go over or under their projected win totals. And can Mike Norvell and Florida State finally get the Seminoles going?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew takes a deeper dive into the ACC, with discussions about the league's top QBs and about potential sleeper teams on the Atlantic Coast
